channel.title: CVE Feed for advancedcoding -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for advancedcoding -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-3998|2024-08-02T07:17:10.431Z -- advancedcoding -- comments%20%E2%80%93%20wpdiscuz
item.description: The wpDiscuz plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing authorization check on the userRate function in versions up to, and including, 7.6.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to increase or decrease the rating of a post.

item.title: CVE-2023-3869|2024-08-02T07:08:50.666Z -- advancedcoding -- comments%20%E2%80%93%20wpdiscuz
item.description: The wpDiscuz plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing authorization check on the voteOnComment function in versions up to, and including, 7.6.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to increase or decrease the rating of a comment.

item.title: CVE-2024-2477|2024-08-01T19:11:53.534Z -- advancedcoding -- comments%20%E2%80%93%20wpdiscuz
item.description: The wpDiscuz plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'Alternative Text' field of an uploaded image in all versions up to, and including, 7.6.15 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-2477|2024-06-06T14:15:00.696Z -- advancedcoding -- comments%20%E2%80%93%20wpdiscuz
item.description: The wpDiscuz plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'Alternative Text' field of an uploaded image in all versions up to, and including, 7.6.15 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-6704|2024-08-02T10:59:33.380Z -- advancedcoding -- comments%20%E2%80%93%20wpdiscuz
item.description: The Comments – wpDiscuz plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to HTML Injection in all versions up to, and including, 7.6.21. This is due to a lack of filtering of HTML tags in comments. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to add HTML such as hyperlinks to comments when rich editing is disabled.

item.title: CVE-2024-6704|2024-08-02T15:30:39.774Z -- advancedcoding -- comments%20%E2%80%93%20wpdiscuz
item.description: The Comments – wpDiscuz plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to HTML Injection in all versions up to, and including, 7.6.21. This is due to a lack of filtering of HTML tags in comments. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to add HTML such as hyperlinks to comments when rich editing is disabled.
